title: "An artificial intelligence system for a complex electromagnetic field problem. I. Finite element calculations and fuzzy logic development"
excerpt: "Artificial intelligence (AI) has been used to determine the electromagnetic field in the complex problem of a faulty overhead transmission line above earth and a buried pipeline. A suitable AI system for scaling finite element electromagnetic field calculations has been developed."
